values: 种；物种；种类；类型；类群；类别

sample.mean: v. 明确说明；具体指定；在设计中明确规定
n. 西风带；（westerly的复数）
v. 选举；投票；提议；投票表决；公认；由舆论决定；（vote的第三人称单数）
n. 风向标；（vane的复数）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，特指有确切定义的群体。
普通用词，文体较kind随便，指对人或对事物进行的大概分类，有时含贬义。
书面用词，单复数同形。指生物分类上的种。
指根据已经确定的类型对某一实物作鉴别和归类。
正式用词，指门类、种类或优劣等级；用于指动植物的分类时，表示“纲”。
指客观界限比较清楚，有相同本质特点的同类事物，或指大致相似的同类事物。
强调有各自的特点，形式不同，品质不同的种类。
指性质相同，而且特征很相似，足以归为一类的人或东西。

word_group.brief_definition: 濒危物种；濒危的物种；濒临灭绝的物种
物种多样性；物种的多样性；种类多样性
活性物种；活性种；反映性物种

bilingual.target: 他准备每种动物的食物。

bilingual.source: The mountain gorilla is an endangered species.
bilingual.target: 山地大猩猩是一种濒危物种。

bilingual.source: There are about 3,000 different species of snakes.
A population is a group of one species that lives.
bilingual.target: 种群是生活在一起的同一种群体。

bilingual.source: There are over a million known species of arthropods.
bilingual.target: 已知的节肢动物种类超过一百万种。
一张关于濒危物种的海报。

bilingual.source: I'm a lawyer who protects rare species.
bilingual.target: 我是一名保护稀有物种的律师。
我们的行为有时会帮助其他物种。

bilingual.source: What gave the new species away was its song.
bilingual.target: 让新物种暴露的是它的歌声。

bilingual.source: Design a poster about an endangered species.
bilingual.target: 设计一张关于濒危物种的海报。

yingyinNormal.en: Ready to make the ultimate sacrifice to save your species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了拯救种族不惜慷慨牺牲!

yingyinNormal.en: Fourteen hundred species of fish live here, and a quarter of all marine species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有1400种鱼类生活在这里，还有四分之一的海洋物种。

yingyinNormal.en: Of the 30,000 species of seaweed which grow in the sea, only around 50 are edible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 海洋中的3万种海藻只有约50种能够食用。

yingyinNormal.en: If a new species is being discovered, it should be by its own kind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新人种若要被发现，那也应该被是自己的同类发现。

yingyinNormal.en: A new species we've made. You just went and made a new dinosaur?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们创造了一个新的物种。你就这么创造了一种新的恐龙？

yingyinNormal.en: If you could merge with another species, what species would you pick and why? Hint: There is a right answer. None of you will get it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你能跟别的物种结合，你会选哪种，原因是什么？提示，有正确答案的哦，你们肯定都猜不到。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah. That's the same. I'm sure there are 30 different species of poisonous swings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两个可以相提并论吗! 秋千上有30种毒液?

yingyinNormal.en: With the emergence of the stone age came the rise of a new species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 石器时代的来临，诞生了许多新物种。

yingyinNormal.en: Ellie, do you realize that now we have a chance to save our species?
yingyinNormal.zh: 伊丽，你现在了解 我们可以救我们的种族吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Sharing has never been the strong suit of your species, Your Majesty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 分享从来都不是你们这个物种的优点。

yingyinNormal.en: On the other hand, I think Sheldon might be the larval form of his species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一方面，我认为谢尔顿处于他这种生物的幼虫阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: And then we built a world like nothing any other species had built before us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还建造了其他物种从未建造过的世界。

yingyinNormal.en: I got some news for you. You're not saving the species tonight or any other night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听清楚，你今晚救不了种族，以后也救不了!

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the animals in question. Are they all different species? Yes. Yes, they are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都在疑惑的动物，他们都是不同种类的吗？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know the main thing that separates a politician from the rest of the species?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道政客这个物种和其他物种最大的区别是什么吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Despite the risks of this collective existence, many species use the reef as a nursery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管这种集体生活存在风险，很多物种还是将珊瑚礁作为了栖息地。

yingyinNormal.en: First, identifying its species, then drawing on principles for dealing with it appropriately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先鉴别种类，然后找到法则以便正确地处理。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine, I'll tell you. A lichen is an organism made up of two separate species, fungi and algae.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是跟你们分享一下吧，地衣是由菌类和藻类这两不同的物种组成的复合有机体。

yingyinNormal.en: Some 65 million years ago, a monster 6 miles wide may have wiped out half the species on Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大约6500百万年前，一个6英里宽的大怪物，可能消灭了地球上半数的物种。

yingyinNormal.en: Tall, beautiful, scary, a different sex, a different species, live-action, cartoon. It's all your call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高大，漂亮，吓人，不同的性别，不同的物种，电影角色，甚至卡通人物。都你说了算。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group into which animals, plants, or others that are able to breed with each other and produce healthy young are divided, smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name

examination_example.sentence: But just some 22, 000 birds remain today, occupying about 16% of the <highlight>species</highlight>' historic range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但今天只剩下大约22,000只鸟，占据了该物种历史范围的大约16%。

examination_example.sentence: The fossil record shows that many <highlight>species</highlight> have endured for millions of years—so why shouldn't we?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 化石记录显示，许多物种已经存活了数百万年——那么我们为什么不能呢？

examination_example.sentence: We have now identified enough of the long-term patterns shaping the history of the planet, and our <highlight>species</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在已经确定了足够多的长期模式来塑造地球和我们物种的历史。

n. 西风带；（westerly的复数）
v. 选举；投票；提议；投票表决；公认；由舆论决定；（vote的第三人称单数）
n. 风向标；（vane的复数）

word_usage.usage: species的单复数同形，用作主语时，其谓语动词可用单数形式，也可用复数形式。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 濒危物种；濒危的物种；濒临灭绝的物种

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group into which animals, plants, or others that are able to breed with each other and produce healthy young are divided, smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name

examination_example.sentence: As such, they are key <highlight>species</highlight> for understanding and predicting impacts of global change on Antarctic and sub-Antarctic marine ecosystems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，它们是帮助人类了解和预测全球变化对南极和南极海洋生态系统影响的关键物种。

examination_example.sentence: The Nature Conservancy has declared war on a multitude of invasive <highlight>species</highlight> here, from sheep to plants to the aggressive Argentine ant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大自然保护协会(Nature Conservancy)已在这里对多种入侵物种宣战，从绵羊到植物，再到侵略性的阿根廷蚂蚁。

examination_example.sentence: Today, federal agencies are pulling the island fox from the Endangered <highlight>Species</highlight> List.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，联邦机构正将岛狐从濒危物种名单中删除。

examination_example.sentence: It is home to one of the world's finest marine ecosystems, with more than 1,300 <highlight>species</highlight> of fish and 700 <highlight>species</highlight> of coral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是世界上最好的海洋生态系统之一，拥有超过1300种鱼类和700种珊瑚。

examination_example.sentence: Why do some <highlight>species</highlight> of bats use their sense of hearing more than their eyes?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些种类的蝙蝠更多地使用听觉而不是眼睛？

examination_example.sentence: In fact, all 1,100 bat <highlight>species</highlight> can see and often their vision is pretty good, although not as excellent as other night-hunting animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，所有1100种蝙蝠都能看到，而且往往它们的视力相当好，尽管不像其他夜间狩猎动物那样出色。

sample.mean: v. 明确说明；具体指定；在设计中明确规定
n. 西风带；（westerly的复数）
v. 选举；投票；提议；投票表决；公认；由舆论决定；（vote的第三人称单数）
n. 风向标；（vane的复数）

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group into which animals; plants; or others that are able to breed with each other and produce healthy young are divided; smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name

examination_example.sentence: They can also harm other wild <highlight>species</highlight> through indirect competition, rather than eating them or shrinking their food supply.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们还可以通过间接竞争伤害其他野生物种，而不是吃掉它们或减少它们的食物供应。

examination_example.sentence: To that end, they have been studying how other <highlight>species</highlight> deal with low gravity, specifically focusing on mice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为此，他们一直在研究其他物种如何应对低重力，特别是老鼠。

examination_example.sentence: It feels unreal. It feels like we're some form of endangered <highlight>species</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感觉不真实。感觉我们是某种濒危物种。

sample.mean: v. 明确说明；具体指定；在设计中明确规定

v. 选举；投票；提议；投票表决；公认；由舆论决定；（vote的第三人称单数）

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group into which animals, plants, or others that are able to breed with each other and produce healthy young are divided, smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name

examination_example.sentence: Of course, if you are a non-human <highlight>species</highlight>, collapse is well underway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，如果你是非人类物种，崩塌正在全面进行中。

examination_example.sentence: Among mammals alone, the number of nocturnal <highlight>species</highlight> is astonishing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅在哺乳动物中，夜行性动物的数量就非常惊人。

examination_example.sentence: Light is a powerful biological force, and on many <highlight>species</highlight> it acts as a magnet (磁铁).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 光是一种强大的生物力量，对许多动物来说，光就像磁铁一样。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group into which animals, plants, or others that are able to breed with each other and produce healthy young are divided, smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name

examination_example.sentence: Education pushes the human <highlight>species</highlight> to progress.
Plants range from various <highlight>species</highlight> of cactus pine forests．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物范围包括各种仙人掌林。

examination_example.sentence: Why do some <highlight>species</highlight> of bats live a very long time?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些种类的蝙蝠寿命很长？
